K12D0450_H0787:409b-19: 'gog pas mu na pa sgra gcan 'dzin //
K12D0450_H0787:409b-20: gsang ba'i sna rtse'i steng 'og tu //
K12D0450_H0787:409b-21: 'byung ba rkyen rlung snang ba grogs //
K12D0450_H0787:409b-22: sgo lnga bzlog las gnas par bya //
K12D0450_H0787:409b-23: ye shes sgron me snang ba ste //
K12D0450_H0787:409b-24: rnal 'byor gang zhig mngon gyur pas //
K12D0450_H0787:409b-25: rlung sems rnam dag rtags 'char ba //
K12D0450_H0787:409b-27: de las rang bzhin dag pa'i tshe //
K12D0450_H0787:409b-28: 'od gsal ngang las spro bsdu nyid //
K12D0450_H0787:409b-30: bde ba'i thig le thabs dang ni //
K12D0450_H0787:409b-31: ye shes me ni shes rab che //
K12D0450_H0787:409b-32: gnyis med dh'u t'i'i nang zhugs pas //
K12D0450_H0787:409b-33: bdud rtsi mi 'pho gsang lam gnas //
K12D0450_H0787:409b-34: de nyid du ni srog brten cing //
K12D0450_H0787:409b-35: 'dzin pa ye shes lam gyur pa'o //
K12D0450_H0787:409b-36: de las gtum mo 'bar gyur zhing //
K12D0450_H0787:410a-3: mgrin par dga' ba snying gar ni //
K12D0450_H0787:410a-4: mchog dga' lte bar khyad par can //
K12D0450_H0787:410a-5: gsang par mi ldog lhan cig skyes //
K12D0450_H0787:410a-7: de nyid ye shse rjes dran gces //
K12D0450_H0787:410a-8: lus ngag yid dang ye shes zhi //
K12D0450_H0787:410a-9: phyag rgya'i de nyid mngon gyur pa'o //
K12D0450_H0787:410a-10: shes pa dag ni rnam dag pa; ;lte bar 'dod chags rtog pa dag /
K12D0450_H0787:410a-13: mgrin par rmi lam shes pa dag /
K12D0450_H0787:410a-14: dpral bar sad pa'i sems ba spangs //
K12D0450_H0787:410a-15: las rlung rtsa yi 'khor lo yi //
K12D0450_H0787:410a-16: thig ler gnas pa rten dang ni //
K12D0450_H0787:410a-17: brten pa byang sems mi 'gyur thob //
K12D0450_H0787:410a-18: las kyi phung po log gyur cing //
K12D0450_H0787:410a-19: mnyam pa'i bden pa la 'jug pa //
K12D0450_H0787:410a-20: gtsug tor sgo ni phye gyur pas //
K12D0450_H0787:410a-21: 'bigs byed brtan pa'i don thob pas //
K12D0450_H0787:410a-22: yon tan dpag med mngon du gyur //
K12D0450_H0787:410a-23: thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa //
K12D0450_H0787:410a-24: dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang du gyur //
K12D0450_H0787:410a-25: de nyid yon tan phrin las tshogs //
K12D0450_H0787:410a-26: rtog med dang las ku du 'byung //
K12D0450_H0787:410a-27: skad cig mngon rdzogs zung 'dzug pa //
K12D0450_H0787:410a-28: ting nge 'dzin zhes brjod pa ste //
K12D0450_H0787:410a-29: gsang chen gnas 'thob mngon sangs rgyas //
K12D0450_H0787:410a-30: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o ////
K12D0450_H0787:410a-31: de nas ye shes kun mkhyen pa'i //
K12D0450_H0787:410a-32: gsang ba rab 'byam grub pa ste //
K12D0450_H0787:410b-0: yang @410b dag spyor pa'i don gyis ni //
K12D0450_H0787:410b-1: thogs med nus pa ldan gyur pa //
K12D0450_H0787:410b-2: bden pa gnyis bsres don bstan pa'o //
K12D0450_H0787:410b-3: phrin las bzhi yi byed pa las //
K12D0450_H0787:410b-4: grub tshul de nyid bstan pa'o //
K12D0450_H0787:410b-5: bzlas thabs bcu yis grub pa'i don //
K12D0450_H0787:410b-6: sngags rnams kun gyi de nyid kyis //
K12D0450_H0787:410b-7: lam rdzogs sa rnams mngon gyur pas //
K12D0450_H0787:410b-8: bdag byin brlab bar gyur ba'o //
K12D0450_H0787:410b-9: tshe 'di nyid dang bar dor ni //
K12D0450_H0787:410b-10: ye shes dngos grub thob par bshad //
K12D0450_H0787:410b-11: gong du 'pho ba'i don grub byed //
K12D0450_H0787:410b-12: bcu bdun lha yi 'khor lo las //
K12D0450_H0787:410b-13: grub pa rab gsal bde thob pa'o //
K12D0450_H0787:410b-15: mtshon byed nus pa thogs med 'byung //
K12D0450_H0787:410b-16: gsal bya gsal byed rgyu 'bras dang //
K12D0450_H0787:410b-17: bskyed bya skyed byed rgyu 'bras so //
K12D0450_H0787:410b-18: ngo bo nyid kyi rgyu 'bras las //
K12D0450_H0787:410b-19: rgyus ni 'bras bu skyes byed pas //
K12D0450_H0787:410b-21: phan tshun ltos pa'i rgyu 'bras so //
K12D0450_H0787:410b-22: ngo bo gcig par grub 'gyur te //
K12D0450_H0787:410b-23: rgyu 'bras rnam pa tha dad kyang //
K12D0450_H0787:410b-24: rigs mthun gnas nyid mtshungs 'bral bas //
K12D0450_H0787:410b-25: grub sde gcig par grub pa'o //
K12D0450_H0787:410b-27: de nyid nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid //
K12D0450_H0787:410b-28: stong nyid dngos po sna tshogs par //
K12D0450_H0787:410b-29: gnas kyang ro mnyam 'gag pa med //
K12D0450_H0787:410b-30: chos rnams snang pa ma lus la //
K12D0450_H0787:410b-31: nam mkha'i rang bzhin dang las 'byung //
K12D0450_H0787:410b-32: sgrib phyogs dang ni snang phyogs dag //
K12D0450_H0787:410b-33: skye 'gag de nyid dngos med pas //
K12D0450_H0787:410b-34: bden gnyis tha dad gyur ba na //
K12D0450_H0787:410b-35: ye shes lam ni don med 'gyur //
K12D0450_H0787:411a-2: rtag chad mthar ni ltung bar 'gyur //
K12D0450_H0787:411a-3: dngos po'i gnas lugs la brten nas //
K12D0450_H0787:411a-4: dngos med ye shes 'od gsal ba //
K12D0450_H0787:411a-5: zab dang rgya che gnyis med pa //
K12D0450_H0787:411a-6: rgyu rkyen ma lus dag byed pas //
K12D0450_H0787:411a-7: bsam gtan ting 'dzin mthar thug ni //
K12D0450_H0787:411a-8: rdo rje lta bu'i ngo bo nyid //
K12D0450_H0787:411a-9: dngos po thams cad zlog byed pa //
K12D0450_H0787:411a-10: shing gi tshogs la me 'bar bas //
K12D0450_H0787:411a-11: bsregs te dngos med 'gyur ba ltar //
K12D0450_H0787:411a-12: mthar ni thams cad stong nyid du //
K12D0450_H0787:411a-13: ye shes mes ni rnam par sbyangs //
K12D0450_H0787:411a-14: nam mkha' lta bu'i dbyings las ni //
K12D0450_H0787:411a-16: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o ////
K12D0450_H0787:411a-17: de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin //
K12D0450_H0787:411a-18: dpal ldan lus kyi rnam shes dang //
K12D0450_H0787:411a-19: ye shes sgyu 'phrul la sogs bstan //
K12D0450_H0787:411a-20: lha mo bzhi dang khro bo bcu //
K12D0450_H0787:411a-21: sna tshogs phrin las du ma mchog /
K12D0450_H0787:411a-23: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las //
K12D0450_H0787:411a-24: phyi nang dbye ba rim pa yis //
K12D0450_H0787:411a-25: ma grub srogs pa'i cho ga ni //
K12D0450_H0787:411a-26: phur gdab de nyid bstan pa'o //
K12D0450_H0787:411a-28: rnam rtog rlung gi ra bar tshud //
K12D0450_H0787:411a-29: bdag 'dzin mdud pas bsngams pa la //
K12D0450_H0787:411a-30: smin grol ye shes lam rtogs pa //
K12D0450_H0787:411a-31: bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya //
K12D0450_H0787:411a-33: so bdun yi ge la dmigs pa //
K12D0450_H0787:411a-34: bcu drug cha dang ldan pa'o //
K12D0450_H0787:411a-35: drod ni snang ba rtog bral sems //
K12D0450_H0787:411b-0: @411b spangs thob yon tan 'byung ba'i gzhi //
K12D0450_H0787:411b-1: rtse mo mchod pa nus pa rnyed //
K12D0450_H0787:411b-3: bzod pa snang ba thob pa nyid //
K12D0450_H0787:411b-4: rtog pa kun las rnam par grol //
K12D0450_H0787:411b-5: chos mchog snang ba nyer thob nyid //
K12D0450_H0787:411b-6: ye shes de ma thag pa che //
K12D0450_H0787:411b-8: rigs pa mngon gyur rtog pa 'dag /
K12D0450_H0787:411b-11: rgyal ba'i dgongs pa rtogs par bya //
K12D0450_H0787:411b-12: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o ////
K12D0450_H0787:411b-13: spros pa med pa'i spyod pa ye shes kyi grub pa'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
K12D0450_H0787:411b-14: dben gnas dben pa yon tan kun dang ldan pa /
K12D0450_H0787:411b-15: lus gnas sems kyi dur khrod rab tu sgrub pa nyid du bya ba ste /
K12D0450_H0787:411b-16: dngos 'dzin rnam par dag pa nyid kyis so //
K12D0450_H0787:411b-17: sme sha can ni rtog med ma'i sha la rol pa nyid de /
K12D0450_H0787:411b-18: khyad par du ye shes yang dag pa bsgrub pa ste /
K12D0450_H0787:411b-19: dus rtag tu ye shes kyi ngang las mi 'da' bar bsgrub pa'o //
K12D0450_H0787:411b-20: rig ma shes rab ye shes las skyes ma /
K12D0450_H0787:411b-21: rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa ste bcu phrag gnyis ma nyid do //
K12D0450_H0787:411b-22: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni /
K12D0450_H0787:411b-23: ye shes kyi sku bskyed pa /
K12D0450_H0787:411b-24: 'od gsal la las byung ba'i lus rten dang brten
K12D0450_H0787:411b-25: par bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'dzin pa chen
K12D0450_H0787:411b-26: po'i pho brang dang ldan pa'o //
K12D0450_H0787:411b-27: de nyid phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnam par dag pa /
K12D0450_H0787:412a-0: dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dkyil 'khor du @412a *//
K12D0450_H0787:412a-2: bshang gci'i dam tshig ni yul dang dbang po gnyis med du sbyar ba'o //
K12D0450_H0787:412a-3: la sogs ni bde ba stong pa nyams su myong ba'i zas kyis khyad par yul la spyod pa'o //
K12D0450_H0787:412a-4: de ru cho ga bzhin du zhes pa rdo rje
K12D0450_H0787:412a-5: 'dzin pa yab yum rol ba bde chen mi 'gyur
K12D0450_H0787:412a-7: de'i dkyil 'khor rten gzhal yas khang chos 'byung dang /
K12D0450_H0787:412a-8: 'byung ba rim brtsegs dang bcas pa rten dang brten
K12D0450_H0787:412a-9: pa'i lha tshogs thams cad ye shes las skyes pa
K12D0450_H0787:412a-10: / ye shes las byung ba'i mtshan nyid bde stong
K12D0450_H0787:412a-11: ro mnyam du 'byung ba'i ngo bo nyid yongs su
K12D0450_H0787:412a-12: / rdzogs pa'o // rab tu bzang bas na 'od gsal ba'i ye shes las skyes pa /
K12D0450_H0787:412a-13: bzhin rab tu mdzes ba ye shes kyi dbang po dang stobs las byung ba nyid do //
K12D0450_H0787:412a-14: rgyan rnams ni bral ba dang rnam par smin pa'i
K12D0450_H0787:412a-15: cha las 'phags pa'i nor las yan lag bdun ldan
K12D0450_H0787:412a-16: ye shes kyi che bas yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
K12D0450_H0787:412a-17: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag ba ni //
K12D0450_H0787:412a-19: reg bya rdo rje ma chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje mar gyur pa rnam par bsgom zhes pa'o //
K12D0450_H0787:412a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i dkyil 'khor /
K12D0450_H0787:412a-22: dpral ba mgrin pa thugs ka lte ba gsang ba
K12D0450_H0787:412a-23: dang bcas par sangs rgyas kyi sku'i mtshan dpe dang
K12D0450_H0787:412a-24: / sku mdog phyag mtshan rgyan dang ldan pa /
K12D0450_H0787:412a-25: ye shes las 'byung ba skad cig gis so //
K12D0450_H0787:412b-0: @412b der rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gsang sngags kyi
K12D0450_H0787:412b-1: rnam par bsam pa'i 'khor lo can gyi gsang ba
K12D0450_H0787:412b-2: ye shes kyi bsgrub pa ste /
K12D0450_H0787:412b-3: bde stong gnyis su med ba'i phyag rgya chen por ngo bo nyid mi 'gyur pa'i mchod pa'i gnas /
K12D0450_H0787:412b-4: tshad med pas yang dag par mchod pa /
K12D0450_H0787:412b-5: dmigs pa rnam par gyur pa'i nyams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis so //
K12D0450_H0787:412b-6: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed ba sum cu ba'o ////
K12D0450_H0787:412b-7: de nyid las gsang ba bla na med pa'i bsgrub pa bstan pa'i phyir /
K12D0450_H0787:412b-8: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can zhes pa ste /
K12D0450_H0787:412b-9: sku rdo rje mi 'gyur ba gsung rdo rje 'gag pa med pa /
K12D0450_H0787:412b-10: thugs rdo rje rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes la /
K12D0450_H0787:412b-11: de nyid dbyer mi phyed pa'i dkyil 'khor /
K12D0450_H0787:412b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
K12D0450_H0787:412b-13: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la kun tu rnam par snang par mdzad pa /
K12D0450_H0787:412b-15: sku'i 'od kyi snang ba las spro ba dang bsdu
K12D0450_H0787:412b-16: bar mdzad pa'i phyir 'od zer chen po dang rab
K12D0450_H0787:412b-17: tu chen po / spro ba dang bsdu ba bsam
K12D0450_H0787:412b-18: gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi ngol pa ston
K12D0450_H0787:412b-19: tu chen po / pa'o // yang de nyid du rig ma'i rigs dag pas /
K12D0450_H0787:412b-20: ye shes bsgrub pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'i phyir /
K12D0450_H0787:412b-21: bram ze ma la sogs pa ste /
K12D0450_H0787:412b-22: rdo rje rigs kyi sme sha can lta bu'o //
K12D0450_H0787:412b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ni /
K12D0450_H0787:412b-24: btso blag mkhan te dngos po thams cad ye shes su sgyur bar byed ba'o //
K12D0450_H0787:412b-25: yang na bram ze zhes pa ste /
K12D0450_H0787:412b-26: sdig pa'i dri mas ma gos pa'o //
K12D0450_H0787:413a-1: rin po che'i rigs la ste /
K12D0450_H0787:413a-2: ye shes 'bar pa'i che pa dang ldan pa'o //
K12D0450_H0787:413a-3: rje'u rigs ni padma can la ste chags pa med pa'o //
K12D0450_H0787:413a-4: rdo rje chos kyi rigs chags pa med pa padma'i
K12D0450_H0787:413a-5: 'dam las thon ba lta bur bsgrub pa nyid do
K12D0450_H0787:413a-6: // yang na gar mkhan gyi rigs kyis kun tu sgyur bar byed pas /
K12D0450_H0787:413a-7: 'di ni ye shes bde chen gsang ba ye shes myur du thob par byed pa nyid do //
K12D0450_H0787:413a-8: yang na padma'i rigs kyi rig ma lta bu'am /
K12D0450_H0787:413a-9: gtum pa ma rnam rtog rtsad nas gcod pa dag gam /
K12D0450_H0787:413a-10: khyad par du rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis /
K12D0450_H0787:413a-11: zhe sdang rdo rje'i 'khor lo dang ldan pas /
K12D0450_H0787:413a-12: snying ga'i gnas su stong pa dang snying rje tha mi dad pa /
K12D0450_H0787:413a-13: byang chub rdo rje'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas /
K12D0450_H0787:413a-14: rig ma autpa la mthing ga'i mdog 'dra ba /
K12D0450_H0787:413a-15: sems dpa' autpa la la chu'i dri mas ma gos pa dang mtshungs pa /
K12D0450_H0787:413a-16: btso blag mkhan thams cad ye shes su sgyur bar byed pa nyid de /
K12D0450_H0787:413a-17: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang mtshungs pa dag ni /
K12D0450_H0787:413a-18: brten bsgrub pa mnyam rjes gnyis su med pas rab tu grub pa'i dbang phyug 'thob pa'o //
K12D0450_H0787:413a-19: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa sum cu so gcig pa'o ////
K12D0450_H0787:413a-20: yang shin tu spros pa med pa'i rnal 'byor bstan pa las ni /
K12D0450_H0787:413a-21: dam pa gnyis kyi sbyor ba ni /
K12D0450_H0787:413a-22: thabs rlung gi sbyor ba dang /
K12D0450_H0787:413a-23: shes rab rig pa stong nyid sbros med lhan cig
K12D0450_H0787:413b-0: skyes pa rang @413b 'byung ro mnyam bde ba chen
K12D0450_H0787:413b-1: po'i sbyor bas ye shes la rol pa gar gyi
K12D0450_H0787:413b-2: nyams kyi spyod pa thams cad 'od gsal ba'i ngang
K12D0450_H0787:413b-3: las / zung 'jug bde ba chen por phrin las thams cad brtsam par bya ba'o //
K12D0450_H0787:413b-4: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang
K12D0450_H0787:413b-5: chub sems 'da' bar mi bya bas 'da' bar dka'
K12D0450_H0787:413b-6: ba ste da phan yon ni sku gsung thugs gsang
K12D0450_H0787:413b-7: ba gsum gyi ye shes dang ldan pa de ni
K12D0450_H0787:413b-8: skad cig de ma thag tu yang /
K12D0450_H0787:413b-9: dpal rdo rje 'chang byang chub sems rdo rje dang
K12D0450_H0787:413b-10: phrin las tha mi dad pa 'thob par 'gyur pa'i
K12D0450_H0787:413b-11: mtshan nyid kyi tha tshig go /
K12D0450_H0787:413b-12: rdo rje nyi ma nub pa rdo rje ni /
K12D0450_H0787:413b-13: sgyu lus dag pa thabs mi phyed pa /
K12D0450_H0787:413b-14: nyi ma ni snang ba dang snang ba mched pa'i cha las nub pa snang ba thob pa las /
K12D0450_H0787:413b-15: khyad par du rang bzhin gyi rtog pa thams cad
K12D0450_H0787:413b-16: rtsa ro rkyang gnyis rlung dang shes pa dbyer med
K12D0450_H0787:413b-17: du bsdus nas / rtsa dbum ye shes kyi ngang du /
K12D0450_H0787:413b-18: spang blang med par nub pa chen po nyid de /
K12D0450_H0787:413b-19: de nyid du nam mkha' rnam par dag pa lta
K12D0450_H0787:413b-20: bu'i bde stong dbyer med 'od gsal chen po rab
K12D0450_H0787:413b-21: tu mi gnas pa'i ngang du gnas bar 'gyur ba'o
K12D0450_H0787:413b-22: // de las slob pa'i zung 'jug tu ldang bas /
K12D0450_H0787:413b-23: skya rengs shar ba lta bu ste /
K12D0450_H0787:413b-24: mkhyen pa'i ye shes dus gsum phyogs bcur khyab pa'i skad cig ma'i khyad par la /
K12D0450_H0787:413b-25: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gyur pa'o //
K12D0450_H0787:413b-26: khyad par sgyu lus rnam par dag pa ye shes kyi rab tu byed pa bstan pa'i phyir /
K12D0450_H0787:414a-1: ste; chos rnams kun dang mtshungs par ldan pa rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba ni /
K12D0450_H0787:414a-2: rin po che bdun dang ldan pa ste /
K12D0450_H0787:414a-3: gnas skabs su 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi rgyan gyis spras pa na /
K12D0450_H0787:414a-4: rgyud gsang chen la rgyan bdun gyis spras par gyur pas /
K12D0450_H0787:414a-5: sku gsum yan lag bdun ldan du grub pa 'dod dang thar pa rab tu grub pa ste /
K12D0450_H0787:414a-6: dbang phyug brgyad ldan zung 'jug bla na med pa rab tu grub pa nyid do //
K12D0450_H0787:414a-7: dngos po dang mtshan mar 'dzin pa thams cad rnam par 'dzin pa /
K12D0450_H0787:414a-8: rnam par dag par sgyu ma rab tu mi gnas par bstan pa'i don du /
K12D0450_H0787:414a-9: de ni rdo rje chos kyi bdag ces tshad med
K12D0450_H0787:414a-10: pa'i byang chub sems las byung ba'i chos kyi dbang
K12D0450_H0787:414a-11: phyug chen po / phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob pa /
K12D0450_H0787:414a-12: dag pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur ba ni /
K12D0450_H0787:414a-13: sa bcu la ni gnas par 'gyur ba ste /
K12D0450_H0787:414a-14: snang ba gsum po rang bzhin dang bcas pa /
K12D0450_H0787:414a-15: thams cad dag pas bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa thob pas /
K12D0450_H0787:414a-16: lus kyi gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs par bgrod pas /
K12D0450_H0787:414a-17: rten dang brten pa rang byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba'i phyir /
K12D0450_H0787:414a-18: rgyal po dpung gi dam tshig 'dzin na /
K12D0450_H0787:414a-19: thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis phrin las yon
K12D0450_H0787:414a-20: tan mi zad pa stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la
K12D0450_H0787:414a-21: sogs pa'i dbang phyug dam pa brgyad la sogs pa
K12D0450_H0787:414a-22: ma 'dres pa'i chos spobs la dbang sgyur ba /
K12D0450_H0787:414b-0: @414b kun gyi mchog tshad med mngon du gyur pa'o //
K12D0450_H0787:414b-1: mngon par byang chub rnam gnyis las //
K12D0450_H0787:414b-2: phyi nang gnyis su dgos pas bshad //
K12D0450_H0787:414b-3: nang gi dus te cho 'phrul bstan //
K12D0450_H0787:414b-4: bdud las rnam par rgyal ba ste; ;rdo rje sgo gsum so sor dag /
K12D0450_H0787:414b-5: slob pa'i phyi yi mngon byang chub //
K12D0450_H0787:414b-6: tho rangs mi slob zung 'jug ste //
K12D0450_H0787:414b-7: sku bzhi gcig tu 'dus pa ste //
K12D0450_H0787:414b-8: skad cig ye shes rnam grol ba'o //
K12D0450_H0787:414b-9: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa sum cu so gnyis pa'o ////
K12D0450_H0787:414b-10: de las mngon par byang chub pa bde ba bde ba chen po'i dbang phyug bstan pa'i phyir /
K12D0450_H0787:414b-11: rdo rje rnal 'byor pas rdo rje lus kyi khyad par la brten nas /
K12D0450_H0787:414b-12: rig ma mngon par 'du bya ba las /
K12D0450_H0787:414b-13: mkha' gsang byin rlabs dang ldan pas /
K12D0450_H0787:414b-14: thabs dang thabs las 'byung ba'i rdo rje chos 'byung padmar nub pas /
K12D0450_H0787:414b-15: shes rab ze 'bru rgyas par zla ba dang nyi ma ro mnyam par gyur pas /
K12D0450_H0787:414b-16: snang ba dang snang ba mched pa dang snang ba thob pa dang /
K12D0450_H0787:414b-17: nye bar thob pa nub pa can gyi ye shes kyi bsgrub pa kun tu brtsam pa'o //
K12D0450_H0787:414b-18: 'od gsal ba'i ye shes thog ma dang mthar 'byung
K12D0450_H0787:414b-19: ba nyid kyis rang bzhin rnams kun 'dar du nub
K12D0450_H0787:414b-21: skya rengs 'char ba'i cha ni mkha' snang dag pa'i
K12D0450_H0787:414b-22: ngang du ye shes 'jug pa dang bzlog par gyur
K12D0450_H0787:414b-23: pas / stong pa bzhi las 'das pa'i ting nge 'dzin mchog ste /
K12D0450_H0787:414b-24: rgyu kun tu byang chub sems 'phel ba las /
K12D0450_H0787:415a-1: kyis; rtsa gnas thams cad du thig le 'phel zhing rgyas pa las /
K12D0450_H0787:415a-2: dga' ba'i dus su rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i skad cig ma dang /
K12D0450_H0787:415a-3: mchog dga'i dus su rnam par smin pa'i khyad par
K12D0450_H0787:415a-4: gyi dga' ba'i dus su rnam par nyed pa nyid
K12D0450_H0787:415a-5: do // skad cig ma gsum las 'das pa'i dus de ma thag pa las /
K12D0450_H0787:415a-6: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba las mtshan nyid bral ba'i skad cig ma mngon du gyur pa /
K12D0450_H0787:415a-7: bde stong ro mnyam gyi ye shes phyag rgya chen
K12D0450_H0787:415a-8: po rab tu mi gnas pa'i don zung 'jug chen
K12D0450_H0787:415a-10: de nyid yongs su dag pa bla na med pa'i che ba bstan pa la /
K12D0450_H0787:415a-11: rgyan rnams don gyi rgyan ye shes kyi che ba bsam gyis mi khyab tu 'char la /
K12D0450_H0787:415a-12: rnam grangs yon tan gyi che ba tshad med par 'chor ba'o //
K12D0450_H0787:415a-13: rnam pa thams cad du rim dang cig car du kun du snang ba'o //
K12D0450_H0787:415a-14: me tog ni gzugs rdo rje spos ni dri rdo rje ma la sogs kyis sgra rdo rje /
K12D0450_H0787:415a-16: reg bya rdo rje ma'i rnam par snang ba'o //
K12D0450_H0787:415a-18: byang chub sems rdo rje'i phrin las /
K12D0450_H0787:415a-19: phung po khams dang skye mched thams cad rten dang brten par gyur pa /
K12D0450_H0787:415a-20: spyi gtsug nas rkang mthil gyi bar du bde ba tshad med pa skyes pas /
K12D0450_H0787:415a-21: snang srid thams cad bde ba tshad med par gyur pa /
K12D0450_H0787:415a-22: sa gsum kun tu sgyu ma'i rol pas mi zad
K12D0450_H0787:415b-0: pa'i cho 'phrul dpag tu med @415b pa skad cig
K12D0450_H0787:415b-2: de'i tshe bstan ba sku gsum mchog ni /
K12D0450_H0787:415b-5: mi rtog pa chos kyi sku ste /
K12D0450_H0787:415b-6: dbyer med ngo bo nyid lhun grub de la; phrin
K12D0450_H0787:415b-7: las thogs pa med par 'char bas rab tu bsgom
K12D0450_H0787:415b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing khams tshad med pa'i snang
K12D0450_H0787:415b-10: ba chen pos kun tu byas pa spro bsdu'i mdzad
K12D0450_H0787:415b-11: pa ston pa'o // de las dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba ni /
K12D0450_H0787:415b-12: thabs snying rje chen po bla na med pa ni
K12D0450_H0787:415b-13: shes rab rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan
K12D0450_H0787:415b-14: pa'i stong nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dbyings dang ye
K12D0450_H0787:415b-15: shes dbyer med du gyur pa'o //
K12D0450_H0787:415b-16: sangs rgyas ni slob pa las 'das pa mi slob pa'i zung 'jug ste /
K12D0450_H0787:415b-17: byang chub ni yang dag pa'i ye shes thugs su chud pa'o //
K12D0450_H0787:415b-18: gnas zhi ba ste mtha' thams cad dang bral ba
K12D0450_H0787:415b-19: gnyis med zung 'jug chen po mngon du gyur pas
K12D0450_H0787:415b-20: sa bcu gsum pa'i dbang phyug dam pa'o //
K12D0450_H0787:415b-21: nye bar bsdu ba la gdams pa ste /
K12D0450_H0787:415b-22: rdo rje can ni dag pa'i sgyu lus la gnas pa ste /
K12D0450_H0787:415b-23: mi slob pa'i zung 'jug lam thams cad mthar phyin pas srod dus su bdud bcom ste /
K12D0450_H0787:415b-24: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po'i nus pa thob pa /
K12D0450_H0787:415b-25: thob pas ye shes chen po gsang ba'i gnas grub pa'o //
K12D0450_H0787:415b-26: tho rangs shin tu rnam par dag pa'i grub pa /
K12D0450_H0787:415b-27: ye shes rab tu mi gnas pa /
K12D0450_H0787:415b-28: gtsug tor chen po rab tu rdzogs pa bde ba
K12D0450_H0787:416a-0: chen po mi shigs pa bla na med pa @416a
K12D0450_H0787:416a-2: bshang gci'i dam tshig bza' ba ni /
K12D0450_H0787:416a-3: dbyings kyi ngang du ye shes ro mnyam du thim
K12D0450_H0787:416a-4: pas dngos grub ma zad pa ye shes rgya mtsho
K12D0450_H0787:416a-5: rnam par dag pa; rdo rje sku gsung thugs kyi
K12D0450_H0787:416a-6: gsang ba byang chub chen po rab tu rtogs pa'i
K12D0450_H0787:416a-7: skad cig gcig rdo rje 'chang de bzhin gshegs pa
K12D0450_H0787:416a-9: yang dag bar gsungs pa phyi'i mngon par byang chub pa ste /
K12D0450_H0787:416a-11: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las rab tu byed pa sum cu so gsum pa'o ////
K12D0450_H0787:416a-12: de la 'dir chos thams cad ni sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa /
K12D0450_H0787:416a-13: sgyu ma lta bur spyod cing 'jug pa nyid //
K12D0450_H0787:416a-14: sgyu ma de dag byin gyis rlabs pa'i rim pa las /
K12D0450_H0787:416a-15: ma dag pa las rnam dag lha yi sku //
K12D0450_H0787:416a-16: lus ngag yid gsum sgyu mar lam du 'chang //
K12D0450_H0787:416a-17: phung po khams dang skye mched 'byung sogs rnams //
K12D0450_H0787:416a-18: shes pa gnyis la de nyid yongs bsdus nas //
K12D0450_H0787:416a-19: gang zhig stong chen gnyid log gyur pa ste //
K12D0450_H0787:416a-20: rlung gi byed pas rmi lam mthong bar 'gyur //
K12D0450_H0787:416a-21: rmi lam yul las bye brag 'khrug par snang //
K12D0450_H0787:416a-22: kun du rtog pa'i rgyu 'bras rmi lam rtog /
K12D0450_H0787:416a-23: gang gis mtshan dang nyin du gnyid 'jug pas //
K12D0450_H0787:416a-24: gnyid log sad pa tha dad gyur pa min //
K12D0450_H0787:416a-25: sa mthug bsgribs pas rab tu ring gnyid log /
K12D0450_H0787:416a-26: sngar byas 'bras bu ma smin las rnams kun //
K12D0450_H0787:416b-0: de nas rlung gis las rnams 'byung 'jug @416b 'gyur; ;sngon las smin par gyur na rlung sems dag /
K12D0450_H0787:416b-1: 'jig rten 'pho ba gnas gzhan dag tu 'gro /
K12D0450_H0787:416b-2: ji ltar phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba rnams //
K12D0450_H0787:416b-3: de yi sku la rkang rus sha khrag med //
K12D0450_H0787:416b-4: sems can don du khams la 'jug par mdzad //
K12D0450_H0787:416b-5: sprul ba sgyu mas 'gro don mdzad pa bzhin //
K12D0450_H0787:416b-6: de bzhin gnyid log sad gyur rim pas sems //
K12D0450_H0787:416b-7: rnam rtog dra bas bcings pas tha dad can //
K12D0450_H0787:416b-8: chos rnams las ni yongs su ma 'das phyir //
K12D0450_H0787:416b-9: bden dang brdzun pa gcig dang du mar min //
K12D0450_H0787:416b-10: phyi rol don du gyur ba ci yang med //
K12D0450_H0787:416b-11: de phyir rang sems stong nyid cho 'phrul yin //
K12D0450_H0787:416b-12: sgyu mar snang ba 'khrul ba las bzlog bya //
K12D0450_H0787:416b-13: cir snang med bdag rtogs par bya //
K12D0450_H0787:416b-14: rmi lam de nyid rtog med rang gsal ba //
K12D0450_H0787:416b-15: 'byung ba'i gnas la khams 'dus snang ba gang //
K12D0450_H0787:416b-16: sas brtan chos sdud mes rno ngar chags pa //
K12D0450_H0787:416b-17: rlung gis yang zhing g-yo byed mi brtan pa'o //
K12D0450_H0787:416b-18: nam mkha' la 'dus lus bde nyams bzang ba //
K12D0450_H0787:416b-19: bdud rtsi dag las nus pa 'byung ba ste //
K12D0450_H0787:416b-20: gla rtsis zhe sdang bzhi mnyam gti mug nyid //
K12D0450_H0787:416b-21: ga bur chags byed si hlas nga rgyal bskyed //
K12D0450_H0787:416b-22: sna tshogs las kyis dag dog 'du 'phro byed //
K12D0450_H0787:416b-23: lam gyur dmigs pas yon tan pa rnam 'char //
K12D0450_H0787:416b-24: sngar phyung ba las phyis 'byung rtags su 'char //
K12D0450_H0787:416b-25: yul dus mtshan ma nges pa dran pa'i blo //
K12D0450_H0787:416b-26: nyams snang blo las ma bcos sgyu mar snang //
K12D0450_H0787:416b-27: de nyid chos zin ye shes grogs yin no //
K12D0450_H0787:416b-28: rang srog snying por gyur pa sems nyid las //
K12D0450_H0787:417a-1: lus khams gsum snang ba la //
K12D0450_H0787:417a-2: gzhan pa med cing rlung las khams gsum sprul //
K12D0450_H0787:417a-3: sgyu lus rmi lam rmis pa bzhin du mthong //
K12D0450_H0787:417a-4: khams gsum rlung rig bdag nyid de bzhin nyid //
K12D0450_H0787:417a-5: rjes su rtogs pa 'bring gis chos rnams kun //
K12D0450_H0787:417a-6: sgyu ma rmi lam lta bur 'char ba dang //
K12D0450_H0787:417a-7: rab kyi nam mkha' lta bur rtogs pa ni //
K12D0450_H0787:417a-8: 'od gsal ba la bsam gtan ting 'dzin ldan //
K12D0450_H0787:417a-9: rjes su rtogs pa shin tu rab gyur pas //
K12D0450_H0787:417a-10: yid bzhin nor bu lta bur rtogs pa nyid //
K12D0450_H0787:417a-11: zung 'jug mngon du gyur pa'i don nyid de //
K12D0450_H0787:417a-12: ngo bo nyid las 'bad med gzhan don du //
K12D0450_H0787:417a-13: rtog med mi g-yo lhun grub gyur pa'o //
K12D0450_H0787:417a-14: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las /
K12D0450_H0787:417a-15: rab tu byed pa sum cu so bzhi pa'o ////
K12D0450_H0787:417a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
K12D0450_H0787:417a-17: dkyil 'khor thams cad bsdus pa yi //
K12D0450_H0787:417a-20: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis //
K12D0450_H0787:417a-21: yab yum rol pa gsang ba yi; ;'og min gnas nas 'dir gshegs pa //
K12D0450_H0787:417a-22: byin rlabs ye shes dbab par byed //
K12D0450_H0787:417a-23: 'di ni rdo rje chen po yi //
K12D0450_H0787:417a-24: dbang bskur ye shes gsang ba ste //
K12D0450_H0787:417a-25: rnal 'byor lus kyi gnas rnams su; ;spyi bo lte ba dpral ba dang //
K12D0450_H0787:417a-26: mgrin pa snying ga gsang bar ni //
K12D0450_H0787:417a-27: bder gshegs rdo rje chen po yi //
K12D0450_H0787:417a-28: yab yum phyi nang gsang ba la //
K12D0450_H0787:417a-29: gnyis med rol pas dbang bskur ba //
K12D0450_H0787:417b-0: bde chen @417b ye shes mi 'gyur ba'i //
K12D0450_H0787:417b-1: gsang chen dbang ni dri med pa'o //
K12D0450_H0787:417b-2: gsang ba rdo rje theg pa yi //
K12D0450_H0787:417b-3: sdom pa gsang ba rgyas gdab pa //
K12D0450_H0787:417b-4: rig pa 'dzin pa'i snying po ni //
K12D0450_H0787:417b-5: yang dag sdom pa bstan pa'o //
K12D0450_H0787:417b-6: rlung sems 'gyur ldog dus gnad 'gyur ba nyid //
K12D0450_H0787:417b-7: rlung sems gcig tu gnas sam tha dad 'gyur //
K12D0450_H0787:417b-8: gal te rlung sems gcig tu mtshungs ldan na //
K12D0450_H0787:417b-9: thog mar sngon du 'gro ba gang yin pa; ;'gro 'ong rim pa bzhin du byed 'gyur na //
K12D0450_H0787:417b-10: sngon du 'gro ba gang yin de rjes su //
K12D0450_H0787:417b-11: 'brangs las gang gang byed pa gang de snyed //
K12D0450_H0787:417b-12: so sor byed dam gcig tu mnyam par byed //
K12D0450_H0787:417b-13: so sor byed na gcig pa'i khyad par nyams //
K12D0450_H0787:417b-14: gcig tu byed na snga phyi med par 'gyur //
K12D0450_H0787:417b-15: rlung 'gags na ni rtog pa 'gag mi 'gag /
K12D0450_H0787:417b-16: gal te rtog pa bzlog par gyur pa na //
K12D0450_H0787:417b-17: rlung gis las ni ji ltar byed par gyur //
K12D0450_H0787:417b-18: 'byung ba rlung dang rang bzhin rtog pa dag /
K12D0450_H0787:417b-19: mnyam du 'byung 'jug byed dam mi byed brtag /
K12D0450_H0787:417b-20: srog ste rlung dang rnam shes gang yin pa //
K12D0450_H0787:417b-21: phyi rol 'byung ba'i rlung ni 'gags pa na //
K12D0450_H0787:417b-22: lus can rnams kyi srog kyang 'gag par 'gyur //
K12D0450_H0787:417b-23: phyi yi rlung dang nang gi rlung dag las //
K12D0450_H0787:417b-24: gcig 'gags pas na phyi ma 'gag 'gyur ram //
K12D0450_H0787:417b-25: gcig ni log na thams cad log 'gyur grang //
K12D0450_H0787:417b-26: gcig ni log kyang gsum po mi ldog 'gyur //
K12D0450_H0787:417b-27: 'di yi dbye ba khyad par rtogs par bya //
K12D0450_H0787:417b-28: rlung sems 'gro ldog gi gnas lugs bstan pa'o //
K12D0450_H0787:418a-1: tu ma byin len pa ni //
K12D0450_H0787:418a-2: yon tan ye shes phrin las kun //
K12D0450_H0787:418a-3: dus med par ni nus pas blang //
K12D0450_H0787:418a-4: rnam rtog ltung byed ma lus pa //
K12D0450_H0787:418a-5: rang bzhin shes pas rtsa ba bcad //
K12D0450_H0787:418a-6: chos rnams sgyu ma rmi lam ltar //
K12D0450_H0787:418a-7: gsang ba bde chen grub pa la //
K12D0450_H0787:418a-8: rmad byung bde chen 'dod chags nyid //
K12D0450_H0787:418a-9: shes pas rang bzhin med bar smra //
K12D0450_H0787:418a-10: rdo rje 'dzin par gnas par spyad; ;bzlog ba sman nyid ye shes che //
K12D0450_H0787:418a-11: log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0450_H0787:418a-12: sngom pa thabs dang shes rab dag /
K12D0450_H0787:418a-13: gnyis med phyag rgya chen por na //
K12D0450_H0787:418a-14: dus kun du ni de nyid sdom //
K12D0450_H0787:418a-15: sdom pa thams cad kyi gsang ba zil gnon rdo
K12D0450_H0787:418a-16: rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin spyod pa'i brtul
K12D0450_H0787:418a-17: zhugs so // rdo rje'i bdag nyid gsum 'dus nas //
K12D0450_H0787:418a-19: de gnyis sku gsung thugs rdo rje //
K12D0450_H0787:418a-20: rtog pa'i dba' rlabs rab zhi ba //
K12D0450_H0787:418a-21: nyer dpyad ye shes sgyu ma dag pa las //
K12D0450_H0787:418a-22: yongs dag rnal 'byor spros bcas dang //
K12D0450_H0787:418a-23: spros med las 'das stong pa nyid; ;'od gsal shin tu sbros med las //
K12D0450_H0787:418a-24: phyag rgya chen po zung 'jug thob //
K12D0450_H0787:418a-25: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las /
K12D0450_H0787:418a-26: rab tu byed pa sum cu so lnga pa'o ////
K12D0450_H0787:418a-27: 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi //
K12D0450_H0787:418a-28: de nyid gsang chen tshul mchog ste //
K12D0450_H0787:418a-30: byang chub sangs rgyas gnas 'jug ba'o //
K12D0450_H0787:418b-0: de kho na nyid las @418b mngon rtogs //
K12D0450_H0787:418b-1: bsam gyis mi khyab rgyan gyur pa'o //
K12D0450_H0787:418b-2: brjod bya dang ni rjod byed dang //
K12D0450_H0787:418b-3: dpa' dang mngon byung stobs dang ni //
K12D0450_H0787:418b-4: chos don khyab par gyur pa'i phyir //
K12D0450_H0787:418b-5: stobs ldan khyad par rgyan yin no //
K12D0450_H0787:418b-6: gnas pa dang ni gsal rdzu 'phrul //
K12D0450_H0787:418b-7: yon tan phrin las rgyan rim bzhin //
K12D0450_H0787:418b-8: de ni rjod byed rtag tu rgyan //
